Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Prevents unfounded complaints against police officers, peace officers, firefighters, correction officers, and emergency medical service providers from being disclosed or added to personnel records
Summary: Prevents unfounded complaints against police officers, peace officers, firefighters, correction officers and emergency medical service providers from being disclosed or added to such police officer, peace officer, firefighter, correction officer or emergency medical service provider's personnel record.
LawCode: Add ยง50-a, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to preventing unfounded complaints against police officers, peace officers, firefighters, correction officers and emergency medical service providers from being disclosed or added to a personnel record
